actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Public Works.

official_title: A bill to authorize certain filling and construction in the Hudson River, Hudson County, New Jersey.

summary.text: Declares a portion of the Hudson River in New Jersey to be a nonnavigable water of the United States and grants the consent of Congress to certain filling and construction activities thereon, subject to a determination by the Secretary of the Army that such project is in the public interest.

titles.title: A bill to authorize certain filling and construction in the Hudson River, Hudson County, New Jersey.
